mapper.select: SELECT r.review_id, r.place_id, t.place, r.contents, r.photo, r.PASSWORD, r.write_date, SUBSTRING(r.write_date, 1, 16) AS `write_date` FROM tptp t INNER JOIN review r ON t.`id` = r.place_id ORDER BY r.write_date DESC;

SELECT r.review_id, r.place_id, t.place, r.contents, r.photo, r.PASSWORD, r.write_date, SUBSTRING(r.write_date, 1, 16) AS writeDate FROM tptp t INNER JOIN review r ON t.`id` = r.place_id WHERE r.place_id =#{placeId} ORDER BY r.write_date DESC;
SELECT t.place FROM tptp t INNER JOIN review r ON t.`id` = r.place_id WHERE r.place_id = #{placeId};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review ( review_id, place_id, contents, photo, password, write_date ) values ( #{reviewId}, #{placeId}, #{contents}, #{photo}, #{password}, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE review SET contents = #{contents}, password = #{password}, write_date = NOW() WHERE review_id = #{reviewId};
mapper.select: SELECT password FROM review WHERE review_id = #{reviewId};
